text: Sano jwatasame petala lya Allah tapate pa chilambo malo gakusamila gamajinji ni kusimana chenene, sano jwatawigule pa nyumba jakwe kusama wa kwa Allah ni Ntenga Jwakwe ï·º, kaneka chiwa ni kunsimana (petala), basi pamasile pagapatikene malipilo gakwe kwa Allah, ni awele Allah Jwakululuka kusyene, Jwachanasa channope
